” When Hillary Clinton Coughs, The Democratic presidential nominee left early during a ceremony in New York to commemorate the 15th anniversary of the September 11 terrorist attacks because she felt “overheated,” her campaign said Sunday.

NEW YORK  —   Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton fell ill during a memorial service marking the 15th anniversary of the Sept. 11, 2001, terrorist attacks, leaving abruptly and inserting new speculation about her health into a presidential campaign in which Republican Donald Trump has called her weak and unfit.
The Democratic presidential nominee fell on her way into her van and had to be helped by her security, according to witnesses and video of her leaving.
Trump, who attended the same event marking the 15th anniversary of the   attacks, was noticeably restrained.
